column1: NGR is from 1950s record. Altitudes match
The 1947 and 1948 readings have been amended on the original record to correct errors due to the measuring glass; these readings have been left in this record
The 1959 records are noted as being unreliable, in fact, the records from 1954 onwards are questionable as there is a note "do not punch" above them, not sure what this means
